Package aima.core.search.framework.problem

Interface StepCostFunction

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultStepCostFunction, MapStepCostFunction
    public interface StepCostFunction
    Artificial Intelligence A Modern Approach (3rd Edition): page 68.

    The step cost of taking action a in state s to reach state s' is denoted by c(s, a, s').
    Author:
    Ravi Mohan, Ciaran O'Reilly

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      double c​(java.lang.Object s, Action a, java.lang.Object sDelta)
      Calculate the step cost of taking action a in state s to reach state s'.

    • Method Detail

      • c

        double c​(java.lang.Object s,
         Action a,
         java.lang.Object sDelta)
        Calculate the step cost of taking action a in state s to reach state s'.
        Parameters:
        s - the state from which action a is to be performed.
        a - the action to be taken.
        sDelta - the state reached by taking the action.
        Returns:
        the cost of taking action a in state s to reach state s'.
